data.enText: a mark that is left on the skin after a wound has healed
Will the operation leave a scar?
a permanent feeling of great sadness or mental pain that a person is left with after an unpleasant experience

data.chText: 他在狱中的岁月给他留下了深深的创伤。
data.enText: His years in prison have left deep scars .

data.chText: 有损外观（或公共形象）的地方；污点；杀风景之处
data.enText: something unpleasant or ugly that spoils the appearance or public image of sth

data.chText: 城里依旧可见战争的疮痍。
data.enText: The town still bears the scars of war.

data.chText: 种族主义行为给这项运动抹了黑。
data.enText: Racism has been a scar on the game.
an area of a hill or cliff where there is exposed rock and no grass
to leave a mark on the skin after it has healed

data.chText: 他的脸上留下了明显的疤痕。

data.enText: to leave sb with a feeling of sadness or mental pain

data.chText: 那段经历给她留下终生的创伤。
data.enText: The experience left her scarred for life .
to spoil the appearance of sth

data.chText: 采石场破坏了山里的景观。
data.enText: The hills are scarred by quarries.

means: 有损外观(或公共形象)的地方

tr: a mark left (usually on the skin) by the healing of injured tissue

example: The skin disease scarred his face permanently

value.def: A scar is a mark on the skin which is left after a wound has healed.

example.ex: He had a scar on his forehead.
...facial injuries which have left permanent scars.
example.tran: 留下了永久性疤痕的面部创伤

value.def: If your skin is scarred, it is badly marked as a result of a wound.

example.ex: He was scarred for life during a pub fight...
example.tran: 在一次酒吧斗殴中，他留下了永久性的伤疤。

example.ex: His scarred face crumpled with pleasure.
example.tran: 他那张疤脸高兴得皱了起来。

value.def: If a surface is scarred, it is damaged and there are ugly marks on it.

example.ex: The arena was scarred by deep muddy ruts.
example.tran: 赛场上留下了深深的车辙泥痕。

value.def: If an unpleasant physical or emotional experience leaves a scar on someone, it has a permanent effect on their mind.

example.ex: The early years of fear and the hostility left a deep scar on the young boy.
example.tran: 早年的恐惧不安和别人的敌意给这个小男孩留下了深深的创伤。

example.ex: ...emotional scars that come from having been abused.
example.tran: 因受虐待而造成的精神创伤

value.def: If an unpleasant physical or emotional experience scars you, it has a permanent effect on your mind.

example.ex: This is something that's going to scar him forever.
example.tran: 这将成为他一生的创伤。
